channel.title: Modern C# in Unity3D
channel.description: Recent content on Modern C# in Unity3D

item.title: Dependency Injection on Unity
item.description: Many has been written about dependency injection, even Unity folks wrote about it long time ago, and there are some good frameworks like Zenject, so what is so cool about dependency injection?

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, I’m Ruben and I’ve been programming with Unity3D since version 3.
